overview: Harry Wheat has more than 40 years experience in the Oil & Gas and Petrochemical industry during which time he held many positions including general management, marketing and manufacturing. Harry formerly served as President of Union Texas Petroleum, a New York Stock Exchange listed company, where he founded and managed the company’s Petrochemical division (purchased for $3.3 Billion by ARCO/BP Amoco). Harry is a former Petrochemical Committee Chairman of the National Petrochemical and Refiners Association (NPRA) the worlds largest Oil & Chemicals Association with over 8,000 members from leading multinational corporations.
